column2: Bioceres Crop Solutions Corp. engages in the provision of crop productivity solutions. The company is headquartered in Rosario, Santa Fe. The Companyâ€™s solutions include seeds, seed traits, seed treatments, biologicals, adjuvants and fertilizers. Through its subsidiary Rizobacter, it operates through Brazil and Paraguay. Through the Rizobacter brand, it produces and sells soybean biologicals.
